game_description: Touring Karts takes maximum advantage of the possibilities of VR by reinventing KART-type races in the midst of chaos full of action and surprises. *Combine your powers! Original mechanisms designed for VR. * More than 500 collectible prizes playing both online and by yourself. * 3 views to choose from: One free of dizziness, a classic one in 3rd person, and immersive first-person view. * 22 tracks inspired by real tracks and 30 customizable cars. * Quickstart mode with all cars and tracks available from the first minute.
